I enjoyed it full," said a twenty -year -old midfielder and a member of the national team after the match.

title: Pět let za propagaci komunismu? Na ty vaše lumpárny upozorňovat nepřestanu, nikdy, vzkazuje Konečná

Nikdy nepřestanu upozorňovat na ty vaše lumpárny, bojovat za naši zemi..., “ vzkazuje vládě europoslankyně a předsedkyně KSČM Kateřina Konečná. Nevynechala ani to, co se odehrálo kolem Marine Le Penové a připomněla i Rumunsko.

title: Farmáři nedodržují opatření. Slovensko kvůli slintavce zpřísní kontroly chovů
description: Slovenské úřady od začátku příštího týdne zpřísní kontroly velkochovů v desetikilometrovém okruhu kolem každého ze šesti dosud potvrzených ohnisek nákazy slintavky a kulhavky, neboť farmáři nedodržují nařízené restrikce proti šíření tohoto vysoce nakažlivého onemocnění skotu a dalších zvířat. Opatření se bude vztahovat na více než 90 velkochovů. Novinářům to po jednání ústředního krizového štábu řekli ministři zemědělství Richard Takáč a vnitra Matúš Šutaj Eštok. Podezření na výskyt dalšího případu nákazy slovenské úřady nemají.
title_translated: Farmers do not follow measures. Slovakia will tighten breeding checks due to a drool
description_translated: From the beginning of next week, the Slovak authorities will be tightening large -scale controls in a ten -kilometer circuit around each of the six outbreaks of the infections of drool and limp, as farmers do not comply with the restrictions on the spread of this highly contagious cattle and other animals. The measures will apply to more than 90 large -scale farms. After the meeting of the Central Crisis Staff, the ministers of agriculture Richard Takáč and the Interior Matúš Šutaj Eštok told reporters after the meeting of the Central Crisis Staff. The Slovak authorities do not suspect the occurrence of another case.

title: Šéf vietnamských komunistů chce vyjít Trumpovi vstříc. Pokud také zruší cla

title: Povedu poklidný, demokratický boj jako Luther King, řekla odsouzená Le Penová
description: Vůdkyně francouzské krajně pravicové strany Národní sdružení (RN) Marine Le Penová, které v pondělí soud uložil zákaz výkonu veřejných funkcí, slíbila, že povede poklidný a demokratický boj. Inspirací je jí vůdce hnutí za práva černochů v USA Martin Luhter King, řekla na sjezdu krajně pravicové strany Liga. Rozsudek, který jí uznal vinnou ze zpronevěry fondů Evropské unie, označila za násilí a konec fungování demokracie ve Francii.
title_translated: I will lead a peaceful, democratic struggle like Luther King, said convicted Le Pen
description_translated: The leader of the French far -right party of the National Association (RN) Marine Le Pen, who imposed a ban on public office on Monday, promised to run a peaceful and democratic struggle. It is inspired by the leader of the Black Rights Movement in the US Martin Luhter King, said at the congress of the far -right party league. The verdict, which recognized her guilty of embezzlement of the European Union funds, described as violence and the end of the functioning of democracy in France.

title: Sparta znovu ukázala na Kováře: perfektní výkon i vteřiny strachu
description: V těžkých chvílích do něj realizační tým vkládá důvěru, kterou splácí skvělými výkony. Brankář Jakub Kovář úspěšně čelil všem střelám hokejistů Komety Brno a zasadil se o výhru 1:0. Pražané srovnali stav semifinálové série na 2:2 na zápasy.
title_translated: Sparta again pointed to the blacksmith: perfect performance and second of fear
description_translated: In difficult moments, the implementation team puts confidence in it, which is repaid with great performances. Goalkeeper Jakub Kovář successfully faced all shots of hockey players Kometa Brno and planted for a win 1: 0. Praguers compared the status of the semi -final series to the 2: 2 for matches.

title: Farmáři nedodržují nařízení, Slovensko zpřísní kontroly kvůli slintavce
description: Zpřísnění kontrol se na Slovensku dotkne více než 90 velkochovů skotu a prasat. Podle ministra zemědělství Richarda Takáče někteří zemědělci nedodržují doposud zavedená opatření.
title_translated: Farmers do not comply with the regulation, Slovakia tightens checks for a drool
description_translated: The tightening of the inspections in Slovakia will affect more than 90 large -scale cattle and pigs. According to the Minister of Agriculture Richard Takáč, some farmers do not follow the measures established so far.

title: Tlak je obrovský, cítí v Boleslavi po další porážce. Budoucnost? Brännström odpoví později
description: Toužili znovu po pohárech, místo toho se však klepou, aby neskončili ve skupině o záchranu. Krize fotbalistů Mladé Boleslavi se prohlubuje, nedělní porážka 0:1 s Duklou pro ně byla v lize pátá za sebou. „Skousnout to nějak musíme. Výsledky nemusejí být vždy fér, ale celkově fotbal spravedlivý je. A my teď nehrajeme dobře,“ pronesl trenér Středočechů Andreas Brännström.
title_translated: The pressure is huge, it feels in Boleslav after another defeat. Future? Brännström replies later
description_translated: They longed for the cups again, but instead they are knocking not to end up in the group to rescue. The crisis of footballers Mladá Boleslav is deepening, Sunday defeat 0: 1 with Dukla was fifth in the league. "We have to bite it somehow. The results may not always be fair, but overall football is fair. And we are not playing well now," said Central Bohemian coach Andreas Brännström.

title: Jak se orientovat na amerických trzích v roce 2025 podle Fidelity?
description: Po období velmi dobré výkonnosti nyní americké trhy vstoupily do období zvýšené volatility, protože trhy řeší chování současné administrativy. USA i tak zůstávají pro investory atraktivním trhem.
title_translated: How to focus on the American markets in 2025 according to Fidelity?
description_translated: After a period of very good performance, US markets have now entered the period of increased volatility because the markets are dealing with the behavior of contemporary administration. The US still remains an attractive market for investors.

title: Ministr Kupka: První autonomní vlak se poprvé rozjel na české železnici
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu k prvnímu autonomnímu vlaku v ČR.
title_translated: Minister Kupka: The first autonomous train first started on Czech railway
description_translated: Commentary on his public Facebook profile for the first autonomous train in the Czech Republic.

title: Zub, který nebolí, je zdravý a další mýty o našem chrupu
description: Máme nejhorší zuby v Evropě. Minimálně jeden kaz mělo podle průzkumů WHO přes osmdesát procent Čechů. Co opomíjíme u sebe i u dětí? A jak lze zabránit parodontóze?
title_translated: A tooth that does not hurt is healthy and other myths about our teeth
description_translated: We have the worst teeth in Europe. According to WHO surveys, over eighty percent of Czechs had at least one decay. What do we neglect with ourselves and children? And how can you prevent periodontitis?

title: Poprvé rakovinu porazila, podruhé Anička Slováčková hrála o každý den
description: Když se v roce v říjnu roku 2019 Anička Slováčková svěřila médiím, že má rakovinu prsu, asi nikdo netušil, jaký konec to mladé zpěvačce přinese. Zápas s nemocí sváděla statečně šest let, ale byl to boj, který nemohla vyhrát.
title_translated: For the first time she defeated cancer, for the second time Anna Slováčková played for every day
description_translated: When Anna Slováčková confided to the media in October 2019 that she had breast cancer, no one knew what the end of the young singer would bring. She had been bravely for six years, but it was a struggle that she couldn't win.

title: Po Menšíkově triumfu přišla tvrdá kritika hry. Tímhle škodí tenisu, tvrdí Mouratoglou
description: Byla to hodně překvapivá slova jen pár dnů poté, co Jakub Menšík v 19 letech zvedl nad hlavu trofej pro vítěze Miami Open.
title_translated: After Menšík's triumph came hard criticism of the game. This is harmful to tennis, says Mouratogle
description_translated: They were very surprising words just a few days after Jakub Menšík raised the trophy for the winners of Miami Open at the age of 19.

title: České firmy v éře Trumpova chaosu: Exportéři se probouzejí z amerického snu, investoři sní dál
description: Na současnou éru Trumpova úřadování budou mít jednou čeští podnikatelé nejrůznější vzpomínky. Některým exportérům se zhroutí dříve lákavé americké plány, jiné firmy možná pozastaví přímou expanzi do USA. Nadšení investoři, kteří nepřestávají sázet na dlouhodobé přednosti největší světové ekonomiky, ale stále věří, že budou oslavovat.Velké téma o přesunu českého byznysu do USA čtěte v novém e15 magazínu, který vychází v pondělí 7. dubna.
title_translated: Czech companies in the era of Trump's chaos: Exporters are waking up from the American dream, investors eat further
description_translated: Czech entrepreneurs will have various memories of the current era of Trump's office. Some exporters will collapse the previously tempting US plans, other companies may suspend direct expansion to the US. Enthusiastic investors who continue to bet on the long -term advantages of the world's largest economy, but still believe that they will celebrate. Read the E15 magazine, which is published on Monday 7 April.

title: Ještěd v šatníku? Trojice přátel propojila módu a lásku ke krásám Česka
description: Láska k cestování, objevování a kráse přírody se snoubila s touhou tvořit srdcem. Tak vznikla severočeská značka RaJOn, která odráží hrdost k vlasti a obdiv k městům, historii a kultuře. Prvním motivem se stal Ještěd.
title_translated: Ještěd in the wardrobe? Trinity friends connected fashion and love for the beauty of the Czech Republic
description_translated: The love of traveling, discovering and the beauty of nature has combined with a desire to form a heart. This is how the North Bohemian Rajon brand was created, which reflects the pride in the homeland and admiration for cities, history and culture. Ještěd was the first motive.

title: Nové dávky 2026 a 2027: hlídačkovné pro studující rodiče, příspěvek na studium pro chudší studenty i prodloužení výplaty náhradního výživného
description: Studenti ze sociálně slabších rodin budou moci žádat o příspěvek na vysokoškolské studium. Studenti, kteří mají dítě do 3 let věku a pobírají RP, získají nárok na tzv. hlídačkovné. Maximální počet výplat náhradního výživného se zvýší na 72 měsíců.
title_translated: New doses 2026 and 2027: Watchtail for students, study allowance for poorer students and extension of substitute maintenance payments
description_translated: Students from socially weaker families will be able to apply for a contribution to higher education. Students who have a child under 3 years of age and receive RP will be entitled to a so -called guard. The maximum number of substitute maintenance payments will be increased to 72 months.

title: Voda z Česka teče do tří moří
description: Také voda má na zemském povrchu své místo. I když v Česku tvoří pouze 2,2 % celkové rozlohy, její význam rozhodně není zanedbatelný. Vodní toky na území České republiky rozděluje Ministerstvo zemědělství na významné vodní toky v celkové délce 16 326.
title_translated: Water from the Czech Republic flows into three seas
description_translated: Also, water has its place on the Earth's surface. Although only 2.2 % of the total area in the Czech Republic, its meaning is certainly not negligible. Watercourses in the Czech Republic are divided by the Ministry of Agriculture into important watercourses in a total length of 16 326.

title: Jak reagovat na americká cla. Ministři obchodu EU se sejdou v Lucemburku
description: Evropská unie řeší, jak se postavit k clům vyhlášeným americkým prezidentem Donaldem Trumpem. V pondělí se kvůli tomu sejdou v Lucemburku unijní ministři obchodu. Česko zastoupí ministr Lukáš Vlček (STAN). Ten zavedení cel považuje za velkou chybu.
title_translated: How to respond to the American CLA. EU trade ministers will meet in Luxembourg
description_translated: The European Union is dealing with how to stand up to the Clems renowned by US President Donald Trump. On Monday, EU Ministers of trade will meet in Luxembourg. The Czech Republic will be represented by Minister Lukáš Vlček (STAN). He considers the introduction of cells a big mistake.

title: Obchodní centra prožívají renesanci. Investoři do nich vkládají miliardy
description: Po letech nejistoty způsobených pandemií a inflací se obchodní centra v Česku opět dostala do popředí zájmu. Lidé se do nich vracejí nejen za nákupy, ale i za zábavou. Utrácí tam navíc stále více peněz, což přitahuje investory, pro něž nákupní domy představují šanci, jak zhodnotit své peníze.
title_translated: The shopping centers are experiencing a Renaissance. Investors put billions of
description_translated: After years of uncertainty caused by pandemies and inflation, shopping centers in the Czech Republic again came to the forefront. People return to them not only for shopping but also for fun. Moreover, he is spending more and more money there, which attracts investors for which shopping houses are a chance to appreciate their money.

title: GLOSA: Živě z New Yorku, je sobota večer! Aneb takto se dělá televizní zábava
description: Nikdo jim nevěřil a jejich show dost možná nikdy neměla spatřit světlo světa. Měli se stát dočasnou loutkou v rukou televizních mocipánů své doby. Odhodlání, odvaha i talent si však svou cestu prorazily a Spojené státy americké díky tomu už 50 let v sobotu večer slýchají známou větu: „Live from New York, it’s Saturday Night.“
title_translated: Glosa: Live from New York, it's Saturday evening! Or this is done by television entertainment
description_translated: No one believed them and their show may have never seen the light of day. They were supposed to become a temporary puppet in the hands of the TV power of their time. However, determination, courage and talent have broken their way, and the United States has been hearing a well -known sentence for 50 years on Saturday evening: "Live from New York, It’s Saturday Night."

title: Na sítích zabodovali s kamennou kuchyní. Díky neobvyklé volbě svůj dům milují
description: Manželský pár proslavila jejich kamenná kuchyně navozující nejen středomořskou atmosféru. Proč jim někteří nevěří, že přestavbu zvládli svépomocí?
title_translated: They scored a stone kitchen on the nets. Thanks to the unusual choice they love their house
description_translated: The married couple became famous for their stone cuisine, which evokes not only the Mediterranean atmosphere. Why don't some trust them that they managed to convert themselves by their own?

title: 🎧 Správný odpočinek je dnes pro sportovce větší věda než trénink, říká Jan Koukal
description: MediCast je podcastová série e15, ve které šéfredaktor Nikita Poljakov se spolumoderátorem Tomášem Drbalem ze společnosti BTL probírají témata spojená se světem medicíny, technologií a byznysu. Hostem dalšího dílu podcastu byl Jan Koukal, historicky nejúspěšnější český squashista, který se v současnosti věnuje sport managementu a práci s mladými talenty.
title_translated: 🎧 The right rest is more science for athletes today than training, says Jan Koukal
description_translated: Medicast is a podcast series E15, in which the editor -in -chief Nikita Poljakov with co -moderator Tomáš Drbal of BTL discusses topics associated with the world of medicine, technology and business. The guest of another episode of the podcast was Jan Koukal, the most successful Czech squash player, who is currently engaged in sport management and work with young talents.

title: Někdy si musíte vzít lék, prohlásil Trump. Pokles trhů ho neznepokojuje
description: Základní desetiprocentní clo na dovozy ze zahraničí začaly USA uplatňovat od soboty. Od středy mají začít platit zvýšená cla. Ta se týkají jen některých zemí, mezi nimi i EU, na kterou budou USA uplatňovat dvacetiprocentní clo.
title_translated: Sometimes you have to take a medicine, Trump said. The drop in markets does not worry him
description_translated: The US has begun to apply the basic 10 % customs duties from abroad since Saturday. From Wednesday, increased duties are to start to pay. This applies only to some countries, including the EU, to which the US will apply 20 % duty.

title: Nahradí roboti lékaře? V budoucnu značnou část práce převezmou, tvrdí expert
description: Lékařství je jednou z oblastí, kde je často vidět nové úspěchy technologií. Od chytrých umělých končetin po algoritmy schopné odhalit nádory na rentgenových snímcích. Velký prostor pro růst má také robotika a chytrá kybernetika.
title_translated: Will the robots replace the doctor? A large part of the work will be taken over in the future, the expert says
description_translated: Medicine is one of the areas where new technology achievements are often seen. From smart artificial limbs to algorithms capable of detecting tumors on X -ray images. Robotics and smart cybernetics also have a large space for growth.

title: Jihočech naučil hvězdy oblékat české kimono. Nosí ho i bojovník UFC Procházka
description: Miloslav Schwarz proměnil svou lásku ke karate v mezinárodně uznávanou značku Kaze. Začínal skromně ve Slavonicích v jižních Čechách. Záhy se však jeho kimona a sportovní vybavení staly synonymem kvality a používají je světoví šampioni i hollywoodské hvězdy.
title_translated: South Bohemia taught the stars to dress Czech kimono. The UFC Warrier Wears him
description_translated: Miloslav Schwarz has transformed his love for karate into an internationally recognized Kaze brand. He started modestly in Slavonice in South Bohemia. Soon, however, his kimonos and sports equipment have become synonymous with quality and are used by world champions and Hollywood stars.

title: Jak reagovat na americká cla. Ministři obchodu EU se sejdou v Lucemburku
description: Evropská unie řeší, jak se postavit k clům vyhlášeným americkým prezidentem Donaldem Trumpem. V pondělí se kvůli tomu sejdou v Lucemburku unijní ministři obchodu. Česko zastoupí ministr Lukáš Vlček (STAN). Ten zavedení cel považuje za velkou chybu.
title_translated: How to respond to the American CLA. EU trade ministers will meet in Luxembourg
description_translated: The European Union is dealing with how to stand up to the Clems renowned by US President Donald Trump. On Monday, EU Ministers of trade will meet in Luxembourg. The Czech Republic will be represented by Minister Lukáš Vlček (STAN). He considers the introduction of cells a big mistake.

title: Legendární zápasník MMA McGregor chce být prezidentem. Má šanci?
description: Conora McGregora znají zejména fanoušci sportu, konkrétně smíšených bojových umění, fungujících pod zkratkou MMA. Asi největší světová legenda tohoto stále populárnějšího bojového sportu se nyní rozhodla vstoupit do světa politiky. Na konci března totiž nyní třiceti šestiletý sportovec oznámil, že bude kandidovat na funkci irského prezidenta. Nejbližší hlasování o nové irské hlavě státu se při tom musí uskutečnit do letošního 11. listopadu.
title_translated: The legendary wrestler MMA McGregor wants to be president. Does he have a chance?
description_translated: Conor McGregor is known mainly by sports fans, namely mixed martial arts, operating under the abbreviation MMA. Perhaps the world's greatest legend of this increasingly popular combat sport has now decided to enter the world of politics. At the end of March, the thirty -six -year -old athlete has now announced that he will run for the post of Irish president. The closest vote on the new Irish head of the state must take place in this year's 11th November.

title: Pardubice přehrály ve třetím semifinále Hradec
description: Pardubice - Hokejisté Pardubic porazili ve třetím semifinále doma Hradec Králové 4:0 a ujali se v sérii na čtyři vítězné zápasy vedení 2:1. Dynamo rozhodlo třemi góly mezi 12. a 17. minutou, o které...
title_translated: Pardubice lost in the third semifinal Hradec
description_translated: Pardubice - Hockey players of Pardubice defeated Hradec Králové 4: 0 in the third semifinals and took the series for four winning matches 2: 1. Dynamo decided three goals between the 12th and 17th minute, which ...

title: Pardubický Sedlák po faulu nedohrál zápas s Hradcem Králové. ‚Je stabilizovaný v nemocnici,‘ hlásí klub
description: Kapitán hokejistů Pardubic Lukáš Sedlák skončil po pár minutách třetího semifinále extraligy v nemocnici a podle informací klubu je ve stabilizovaném stavu. Led opustil na nosítkách v 7. minutě po faulu královéhradeckého obránce Martina Pláňka.
title_translated: Pardubice farmer after foul did not play match with Hradec Králové. 'Is stabilized in the hospital,'
description_translated: Pardubice hockey captain Lukáš Sedlák ended after a few minutes of the third semi -final of the extra -league in the hospital and according to the club's information he is in a stabilized state. He left the ice on a stretcher in the 7th minute after the foul of Hradec Králové defender Martin Pláňka.

title: Druhé vítězství, ale i ztráta kapitána. Pardubice přehrály Mountfield 4:0
description: Jasné vitězství ale také strach o spoluhráče přinesl hokejistům Pardubic třetí duel semifinálového derby proti Hradci Králové. Hráči z města perníku rozhodli o svém triumfu třemi brankami už v první dvacetiminutovce, v ní ale také ztratili Lukáše Sedláka, jehož museli po ataku protihráče odvážet z ledu na nosítkách a skončil v nemocnici.
title_translated: The second victory, but also the loss of the captain. Pardubice played Mountfield 4: 0
description_translated: But the third duel of the semifinal derby against Hradec Králové also brought clear Vitusism to the teammates. Players from the city of Gingerbread decided on their triumph with three goals already in the first 20 minutes, but also lost Lukáš Sedlak, who had to take the opponent from the ice on the stretcher and ended up in the hospital.

title: Pardubice - Hradec 4:0. Hladký návrat Dynama do vedení. Ztráta Sedláka spustila lavinu
description: Hokejisté Pardubic ve třetím semifinále play off Tipsport extraligy zvítězili 4:0 nad Hradcem Králové a dostali se do vedení 2:1 na zápasy. Duel na hřišti Dynama výrazně ovlivnila ztráta domácího kapitána Lukáše Sedláka, který ošklivě upadl hlavou na led po zásahu od obránce Martina Pláňka a zdravotníky byl následně odvezen na nosítkách. Výběr kouče Miloslava Hořavy sice nevyužil dlouhé přesilovky, ale krátce po jejím konci rozjel gólovou show Patrik Poulíček. Brankář Roman Will vychytal čisté konto.
title_translated: Pardubice - Hradec 4: 0. Smooth return Dynamo to the lead. The loss of the farmer triggered an avalanche
description_translated: Pardubice hockey players in the third playoff semi -finals won 4: 0 over Hradec Králové and got into the lead 2: 1 for matches. The duel on the Dynamo playground was significantly influenced by the loss of home captain Lukáš Sedlák, who was ugly his head on the ice after the intervention of the defender Martin Pláňka and the medical workers were subsequently taken on a stretcher. The selection of coach Miloslav Hořava did not use long power plays, but shortly after its end, Patrik Poulíček scored a goal show. Goalkeeper Roman Will took a clean account.

title: V Japonsku se do moře zřítila záchranářská helikoptéra, tři mrtví
description: Tři lidé zemřeli poté, co se v pondělí v Japonsku v prefektuře Nagasaki zřítila do moře helikoptéra letecké záchranné služby. Informuje o tom agentura AP, podle níž zbylí tři pasažéři přežili. Z helikoptéry se jim podařilo dostat a na pomoc vyčkali na nafukovacích plavidlech.
title_translated: In Japan, a rescue helicopter crashed into the sea, three dead
description_translated: Three people died after Monday in Japan in Nagasaki prefecture collapsed into the sea of ​​the air rescue helicopter. The AP reports that the remaining three passengers survived. They managed to get out of the helicopter and waited for inflatable vessels to help.

title: Padouchovi gratuloval i Pastrňák. Ovečkinův rekord rozděluje. Sportovně bomba, ale...
description: Kýžená meta padla. Národní hokejová liga žije nadšením okolo Alexe Ovečkina a jeho střeleckého rekordu, který stanovil 895. trefou v nedělním utkání s Islanders. Fanoušci, odborníci i hráči v zámoří odstřihli lidské nedostatky gólového velikána, který zároveň slouží jako jedna z velkých tváří propagace režimu diktátora Vladimira Putina. Ke gratulantům se přidaly i české hvězdy David Pastrňák a Radko Gudas. „Pro mou kariéru bylo skvělé, že jsem proti tobě hrál,“ řekl útočník Bostonu.
title_translated: Pastouch was also congratulated by Pastrňák. Ovechkin's record divides. Sports bomb, but ...
description_translated: The desired meta fell. The National Hockey League lives with enthusiasm around Alex Ovechkin and his shooting record, which set the 895. He hit the Sunday match with Icelanders. Fans, experts and players overseas have cut off human shortcomings of a goal giant, who also serves as one of the great faces of promoting the regime of dictator Vladimir Putin. Czech stars David Pastrňák and Radko Gudas also joined the congratulators. "It was great for my career that I was playing against you," Boston said.

title: ONLINE: Jihlava - Zlín 1:0. Dukla hraje o barážový mečbol. Do vedení ji poslal Menšík
description: Boj o postup do baráže o hokejovou Tipsport extraligu nabízí již čtvrtý duel finálové série Maxa ligy mezi Jihlavou a Zlínem. Dukla chce za stavu 2:1 v pelhřimovském azylu navázat na nedělní skalp Beranů a navýšit vedení. Povede se svěřencům kouče Viktora Ujčíka udělat další krok k cestě zpět do nejvyšší soutěže? ONLINE přenos utkání sledujte od 19:00 na webu iSport.
title_translated: Online: Jihlava - Zlín 1: 0. Dukla plays for relegation sword. It was sent to the leadership by Menšík
description_translated: The fight to advance to the hockey Tipsport Extraliga offers the fourth duel of the final series Maxa League between Jihlava and Zlín. Dukla wants to follow the Sunday scalp of the ram and increase the leadership in Pelhřimov asylum. Will the coaches of Viktor Ujčík lead to take another step back to the highest competition? Follow the online transfer of the match from 19:00 on the iBSport website.

title: Fink (BlackRock): Šéfové firem míní, že USA už jsou v recesi. Akcie mohou oslabit o dalších 20 %

title: Gregorová (Piráti): Systém kontroly zahraničních investic je v EU děravý
description: Výbor Evropského parlamentu pro mezinárodní obchod dnes schválil vyjednávací pozici k nové legislativě pro kontrolu přímých zahraničních investic do EU. Návrh, který spoluvyjednávala europoslankyně Markéta Gregorová, přináší výrazné zpřísnění ochrany strategických evropských odvětví. Cílem je zabránit tomu, aby investice ze států jako Čína, Rusko nebo autoritářské ropné monarchie ohrožovaly bezpečnost, veřejný pořádek či hospodářskou suverenitu Unie.
title_translated: Gregorová (Pirates): The Foreign Investment Control System is leaky in the EU
description_translated: The Committee of the European Parliament for International Trade today has approved a negotiating position on new legislation for controlling direct foreign investment in the EU. The proposal, co -operated by MEP Markéta Gregorová, brings a significant tightening of the protection of strategic European sectors. The aim is to prevent investments from states such as China, Russia or authoritarian oil monarchies to threaten security, public order or economic sovereignty of the Union.

title: USA zvýší cla pro Čínu na 104 procent. Peking avizuje „boj až do konce“
description: Už ne 54, ale 104 procent. USA zpřísnily cla pro Čínu poté, co se rozhodla postavit čelem hrozbám amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa a neustoupit obchodnímu tlaku. Peking místo toho již pracuje na dodatečné ochraně svého trhu, který je na exportu do zahraničí závislý. Pravděpodobnost dosažení rychlé dohody mezi dvěma největšími světovými ekonomikami je jen velmi nízká.
title_translated: The US will increase the customs duties for China to 104 percent. Beijing announces "fighting to the end"
description_translated: Not 54, but 104 percent. The US tightened duties for China after deciding to confront the threats of US President Donald Trump and not retire business pressure. Instead, Beijing is already working on additional protection of its market, which is dependent on exports abroad. The probability of achieving a quick agreement between the two largest world economies is only very low.

They occupied the village of Oleksandropil in the Donetsk region and the village of Uspenedka, which is located only six kilometers from the border with the Dnipropetrov region, writes the website of Ukrainian Pravda, referring to information analysts Deepstate.

title: Ředitel ČT je zralý na odvolání, na jeho místě bych asi nečekal, řekl radní Ježek
description: Generální ředitel České televize Jan Souček je podle člena Rady ČT Vlastimila Ježka zralý na odvolání. Pokud k tomu dojde, mělo by se tak stát nejpozději do poloviny června, aby rada měla dostatek času na výběr a jmenování nového ředitele před podzimními parlamentními volbami, řekl pro server Aktuálně.cz.
title_translated: The director of CT is mature in the appeal, I would probably not expect in his place, said councilor Ježek
description_translated: According to a member of the Czech Television Council, the CEO of Czech Television is a mature, according to a member of the CT Council. If this happens, this should happen by mid -June at the latest for the Council to have enough time to choose and appoint a new director before the autumn parliamentary elections, he told Aktualne.cz.

title: V německém městečku našli mrtvou čtyřčlennou rodinu, otec byl policista
description: V německém Klettbachu ve spolkové zemi Durynsko úřady nalezly těla čtyř lidí. Podle médií jde o rodinu se dvěma dětmi.

description_translated: In Klettbach, Germany in the Federal Land of Thuringia, the authorities found bodies of four people. According to the media, it is a family with two children.

description: Policisty a záchranáře „zaměstnala“ v pátek ráno trojice cizinců, která se do sebe pustila v brněnské Kšírově ulici. Všichni skončili v péči zdravotníků. description_translated: Police and rescuers "employed" on Friday morning three foreigners, who embarked on each other in Brno Kširova Street. Everyone ended up in the care of health care professionals. What was the reason for the bloody clash is detected by criminalists.

title: ODS může z koalice Spolu po volbách ještě pěkně bolet hlava
description: Předpokládané nižší volební zisky v nadcházejících sněmovních volbách oproti výsledku v roce 2021 jsou přímou hrozbou pro politiky ODS. V současnosti se preference koalice Spolu pohybují kolem 20 procent. Existuje i varianta propočtů, v níž by lidovci mohli mít početnější sněmovní klub než silnější občanští demokraté.

Currently, the coalition preferences are around 20 percent. There is also a variant of calculations in which the Christian Democrats could have a larger parliamentary club than stronger Civic Democrats.

title: Mistři Fantasy: Vše na top čtyřku! Závěr sezony ovládne Kliment a obrana Baníku
description: Ano, jen dvě kola iSport Fantasy zbývají před tím, než soutěž skončí. Teď není čas na riskantní tahy a dlouhodobé cíle, během dvou víkendů musí trenéři dohnat co nejvíce bodů. Los jim jde značně naproti. „Všechny týmy top čtyřky mají v závěru soupeře, se kterými by byly ztráty šokující,“ říká redaktor Bartoloměj Černík v novém dílu pořadu Mistři Fantasy.

Now there is no time for risky moves and long -term goals, during two weekends the coaches have to take as many points as possible. The lot is very opposite. "All teams of the top four have at the end of the opponent with whom the losses would be shocking," says editor Bartoloměj Černík in the new episode of Masters Fantasy.

title: Čína vrací úder: Na americké zboží uvalí cla až 125 procent. Další zvyšování nemá smysl, vzkazuje
description: Čína od soboty navýší odvetná cla na americké zboží z 84 na 125 procent. Americký prezident Donald Trump ve středu oznámil navýšení cla, které označuje jako reciproční, na 125 procent. V součtu s předchozími cly uvalenými v souvislosti s fentanylovou krizí činí celní zátěž čínského dovozu do USA 145 procent.
title_translated: China returns to the blow: CULAs impose up to 125 percent on American goods. Further increasing does not make sense, tells
description_translated: From Saturday, China will increase retaliation duties on American goods from 84 to 125 percent. US President Donald Trump announced on Wednesday an increase in duties, which he calls as reciprocal, to 125 percent. In sum with the previous dies imposed in connection with the Fentanyl crisis, the customs burden of Chinese imports into the US is 145 percent.

description_translated: ** Edge 134 accelerated by 3-9 % in the benchmark Speedometer 3.0. ** It also starts 2 % faster and accelerated by 1.7 %. ** Changes are the result of transition to Web 2.0.

title: Tsitsipas čtvrtý titul v Monte Carlu nezíská, Alcaraz uspěl s odřenýma ušima
description: Řecký tenista Stefanos Tsitsipas titul na antukovém turnaji v Monte Carlu neobhájí. Trojnásobného šampiona porazil ve čtvrtfinále Ital Lorenzo Musetti 1:6, 6:3, 6:4. Po velkém boji postoupil do semifinále Španěl Carlos Alcaraz. Jedenadvacetiletý vítěz čtyř grandslamů udolal o rok mladšího Francouze Arthura Filse 4:6, 7:5, 6:3.

description_translated: Greek tennis player Stefanos Titsipas does not defend the title in the clay tournament in Monte Carlo. The triple champion defeated the Italian Lorenzo Musetti 1: 6, 6: 3, 6: 4. After a big fight, Carlos Alcaraz advanced to the semifinals. The twenty -one -year -old winner of four Grand Slames blew, a year younger French Arthur Files 4: 6, 7: 5, 6: 3.

title: USA přitvrdily s nerosty. Chtějí od Ukrajiny zpětně zaplatit za pomoc a ničím neručit
description: Poslední verze návrhu dohody o nerostných surovinách mezi Ukrajinou a Spojenými státy obsahuje přísnější podmínky než ta předchozí. Nyní Washington požaduje, aby Kyjev zaplatil miliardy dolarů za veškerou pomoc, kterou Američané poskytli již dříve. A to bez jakýchkoli bezpečnostních záruk.
title_translated: The US has hardened with minerals. They want to pay back from Ukraine for help and not to be guaranteed
description_translated: The latest version of the proposal of the Mineral Mineral Agreement between Ukraine and the United States contains stricter conditions than the previous ones. Now Washington demands that Kyiv pay billions of dollars for all the help Americans have provided before. And without any safety guarantees.

title: Nehodu, při které nezabrzděné auto srazilo těhotnou ženu s kočárkem, vyšetřuje policie jako přestupek

Novinkám to řekla policejní mluvčí Eva Červenková.

Police spokeswoman Eva Červenková told the news.

In the finals of the first league, they climbed the first league in the sixth match in Pelhřimov Zlín after a turnover of 4: 1, when all goals scored in the third period. The series won 4: 2.

description_translated: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenkyje asks the Allies from providing ten other Patriot systems. He called on them through the video in the contact group for defense of Ukraine (UDCG).

title: Za žhářským útokem v Litvě stojí 17letý Ukrajinec naverbovaný Ruskem
description: Za loňským žhářským útokem v litevském Vilniusu stojí teprve 17letý Ukrajinec Daniil Bardadim, kterého naverbovala Ruská federace. S odkazem na vyšetřovatele o tom informuje americký deník The New York Times (NYT). Mladík v obchodním domě IKEA založil loni v květnu požár. Ten si nevyžádal žádné lidské životy a způsobil škody ve výši zhruba půl milionu eur (přes 12,5 milionu korun). Litva uvedla, že případ vyšetřuje jako teroristický čin.
title_translated: Behind the arson attack in Lithuan
description_translated: Only 17 -year -old Ukrainian Daniil Bardadim, who was recruited by the Russian Federation, is behind last year's arson attack in Vilnius, Lithuania. Referring to the investigators, the American daily The New York Times (NYT) reports. The young man in the IKEA department store founded a fire last May. He did not require any human lives and caused damage of about half a million euros (over 12.5 million crowns). Lithuania said it was investigating the case as a terrorist act.

title: Na Floridě spadlo letadlo u dálnice. Zemřeli tři lidé
description: Havárie malého letadla na jihu amerického státu Florida v pátek zabila všechny tři lidi na palubě a dalšího člověka zranila. Letadlo se zřítilo u mezistátní dálnice nedaleko letiště ve městě Boca Raton a při pádu vytlačilo jedno auto na železniční koleje. Píše o tom agentura AP s odvoláním na místní úřady.
title_translated: In Florida the aircraft fell by the highway. Three people died
description_translated: The crash of a small plane in the south of the US state Florida killed all three people on board on Friday and injured another person. The aircraft collapsed near the interstate highway near the airport in Boca Raton and pushed one car on the railway track in the fall. The AP writes about it, referring to local authorities.

title: Požár letadla začínáme hasit do tří minut. Hlavní je evakuace cestujících, popisuje velitel letištních hasičů
description: Pětačtyřicet vteřin od vyhlášení poplachu trvá, než hasiči na Letišti Václava Havla naskáčou do vozidel připraveni k zásahu. „Naše taktika je umístit vozidla a začít s hasebním zásahem tak, aby vznikla úniková cesta a lidé se dostali bezpečně z letadla ven, daleko od letadla. A my potom dohašujeme,“ popisuje Pavel Hošek, velitel Hasičského záchranného sboru Letiště Praha, pro Radiožurnál. Jaké nejtěžší zásahy za desítky let služby pamatuje?

"Our tactics are to place vehicles and start with a fire -fighting intervention to create an escape route and people get safely out of the plane, far from the plane. And then we catch up," says Pavel Hošek, commander of the Prague Rescue Corps for Radiožurnál. What are the most difficult interventions for decades of service?

Podle jejího šéfa Roberta Šlachty to totiž budou mít letos malé strany těžké kvůli obavám z propadnutí hlasů. „Jsme pragmatici, vidíme ta procenta, takže o tom jednáme... Jasno bude do konce dubna,“ přiznává v rozhovoru pro MF DNES. Že by zároveň jednal i s ANO, jak se spekuluje, však popírá.

Teď ale vše nasvědčuje tomu, že řidiči se po novém mostě projedou už koncem příštího roku.

For an extremely slender load -bearing structure, it was not certain whether it could be built at all. But now everything suggests that drivers will ride on the new bridge at the end of next year.

title: Čajové mýty: vše je jinak. Reportérka ochutnala čaj na tchajwanské plantáži

Stejně tak drobní farmáři, kteří se jeho pěstování navzdory rostoucí konkurenci velkovýrobců nadále věnují. Jedním z nich je i Jyunyu Bai. One of them is Jyunyu Bai. Thirty-seven-year-old owner of the Taiwanese tea farm By-Theamaster, who fired his beloved surf fifteen years ago and went back to the undulating hills of his native pinglin near Taiwa to take his father's family business.

title: Vyjmutí z Trumpových cel? Rusku to ekonomicky přináší víc problémů než užitku

Minimálně jejich zdůvodnění působilo velmi překvapivě a spíše dávalo tušit, že jde o náhodné přiřazení hodnot bez hlubší logiky. Ale ještě víc překvapilo, které země na seznamu nefigurovaly. Rusko, Bělorusko, Kuba či KLDR se ocitly mezi nimi, což vyvolalo oprávněný údiv.

title: Vobořil o boji proti závislosti: Proč lékaři nepomáhají kuřákům? Změnit to mohou peníze
description: Kouření je v České republice zodpovědné přibližně za pětinu všech úmrtí. Na nemoci způsobené kouřením tak ročně zemře zhruba 16–18 tisíc osob. To znamená, že každý den si cigarety vyžádají zhruba 45 životů – víc než autonehody, alkohol nebo drogy dohromady. Přesto léčebný program pro odvykání kouření využívají jen dvě procenta kuřáků. Proč je tak těžké přestat? Dělá stát dost pro to, aby lidem pomohl? A co všechno víme – nebo naopak nevíme – o takzvaných méně škodlivých alternativách? Nejen na to jsme se v Epicentru ptali expertního poradce premiéra Petra Fialy pro oblast závislostí a někdejšího národního protidrogového koordinátora Jindřicha Vobořila.
title_translated: He said about the fight against addiction: Why don't doctors help smokers? Money can change it
description_translated: Smoking is responsible for approximately one fifth of all deaths in the Czech Republic. About 16–18 thousand people die from the disease caused by smoking. This means that every day cigarettes require about 45 lives - more than car accidents, alcohol or drugs together. Yet only two percent of smokers use the treatment program for smoking cessation. Why is it so hard to stop? Does the state make enough to help people? And what do we know - or do not know - about the so -called less harmful alternatives? Not only we asked the expert advisor to Prime Minister Petr Fiala for addictions and the former national drug coordinator Jindřich Vobořil in the epicenter.

title: Režisér filmu Sám doma 2 by rád vystřihnul scénu s Trumpem
description: Režisér slavného filmu Sám doma 2 s Macaulay Culkinem v hlavní roli Chris Columbus prohlásil, že kvůli studu by si přál, aby byla vystřižena scéna, v níž se na pár vteřin objeví americký prezident Donald Trump. S nadsázkou dodal, že to neudělá, protože by ho Trumpova administrativa mohla deportovat do Itálie, v níž má kořeny. Columbus to řekl v rozhovoru pro server San Francisco Chronicle.

description_translated: The director of the famous film Alone 2 with Macaulay Culkin in the lead role of Chris Columbus said that for a shame he would like a scene to be cut out in which US President Donald Trump would appear for a few seconds. He added with exaggeration that he would not do it, because Trump's administration could deport him to Italy in which he has roots. Columbus said this in an interview with San Francisco Chronicle.

The funeral ceremony hosts the historical building of the National Theater from 11:00. You can watch live broadcast at iDNES.cz from 10:30. The legendary actor and duber died on April 2 at the age of 85.

"We were not de facto presented to discuss it, but we were presented as a finished thing," says Zdeněk Pištora, Vice -Chairman of the Union of Towns and Municipalities, Mayor of Postoloprty in the Louny region.

Drinking water supplies are in charge of the army. The deadline for replacing defective water filters has postponed several times. Now people should wait.

Prvoligová Jihlava obrovskou bojovností a úpornou defenzívou dlouho brnkala favoritovi na nervy. Hanáky spasil útočník Jakub Orsava, který nejprve devět sekund před koncem první třetiny vyrovnal na 1:1 a poté utkání rozhodl, když jako jediný ze všech aktérů proměnil samostatný nájezd.

Hanaky was saved by attacker Jakub Orsava, who first equalized nine seconds before the end of the first period 1: 1 and then decided the match when he was the only one of all actors to change a separate raid.

"Our departure from the government began to significantly interfere with the coalition together, especially in the number of people to whom the law can help," says the program of the Czech Pirate Party, its former chairman and former Deputy Prime Minister Ivan Bartoš.

The purpose of the audit is a comprehensive review of the preparation of the digitization of the construction ...

title: Kdy začíná platit smlouva a jak se počítají lhůty a čas při plnění povinností?
description: Kdy přesně vzniká nebo zaniká určité právo nebo povinnost? A co když je povinnost jednoho vzájemně podmíněná s právem druhého a naopak? Když má být něco vykonáno v určitý den – do kolika hodin?
title_translated: When does the contract start to apply and how are the deadlines and time to fulfill their obligations?
description_translated: When exactly does a particular right or obligation arise or disappear? And what if the duty of one is subject to the right of another and vice versa? When something is to be done on a certain day - how many hours?

title: Nepodceňujte oční kontakt, je to zázrak. Pomůže s pamětí, v lásce i mateřství
description: Oční kontakt je poměrně intimní věc a ne každý ho chce opětovat. Tento druh neverbální komunikace okamžitě vyvolává emoce. Můžete zažít pocit souznění, porozumění, ale také hněv, vztek, nepřátelství nebo ignoraci. Ať tak či onak, pohledem do očí můžete mít hned jasno, co k vám ten druhý cítí.
title_translated: Do not underestimate eye contact, it is a miracle. Will help with memory, love and motherhood
description_translated: Eye contact is a relatively intimate thing and not everyone wants to return it. This kind of non -verbal communication immediately evokes emotions. You can experience a sense of harmony, understanding, but also anger, anger, hostility or ignorance. Either way, looking into the eyes you may be clear about what the other one feels.

title: Jak dlouho si postojíte ve frontě? Redakce otestovala pobočky pošt
description: Čím dál víc seniorů si už penzi nenechává posílat na poštu, ale využívají bankovních služeb a nechávají si ji zasílat na účet. Potvrdil to test MF DNES, který ve všech krajích v Česku mapoval situaci na největších pobočkách pošty během výplatního dne důchodů. Tam, kde se před lety běžně tvořily dlouhé fronty, panoval nyní klid. Závěry testu odpovídají trendu, který zaznamenala i Česká správa sociálního zabezpečení, která má výplatu důchodů na starosti.
title_translated: How long do you stand in the queue? The editors tested the post offices
description_translated: More and more seniors are no longer sent to the post office, but use banking services and have it sent to their account. This was confirmed by the MF DNES test, which in all regions in the Czech Republic mapped the situation at the largest branches of the post office during the pension day. Where long queues were common years ago, there was now peace. The conclusions of the test correspond to the trend, which was also recorded by the Czech Social Security Administration, which is in charge of the payment of pensions.

title: Apple připravuje systém, který má změnit to, jak využíváte jeho iPady
description: Za necelé dva měsíce by měla společnost Apple představit novou generaci operačního systému pro své tablety. A mohla by to být změna, která konečně přinese větší využití potenciálu, který toto zařízení má.

description_translated: In less than two months, Apple should present a new generation of the operating system for its tablets. And it could be a change that will finally bring the greater use of the potential that this device has.

Navíc sleduje příliš dějových linek a nejzábavnější vtipy ukrývá mimo ně, v podtitulcích televizních zpráv jako „další turista napadl medvěda“.

In addition, he follows too many story lines and hides the most fun jokes outside them, in the subtitles of television news as "another tourist attacked a bear".
